library::function(AmesHousing)
library(ggplot2)

\#heating QC

ames_raw %\>% group_by(`Heating QC`) %\>%
summarise(across(SalePrice,mean,na.rm=TRUE))

ggplot(ames_raw,aes(x=`Heating QC`,
y=SalePrice))+geom_boxplot(outlier.shape = NA)

ames_raw %\>% group_by(`Heating QC`) %\>%
summarise(across(`Year Built`,max,na.rm=TRUE))

p \<- ggplot(ames_raw) p

p \<- ames_raw %\>% group_by(`Heating QC`) %\>%
ggplot(aes(x=`Year Built`,y=SalePrice)) +
geom_point(aes(color=as_factor(`Heating QC`),alpha=0.3)) p

p \<- p + scale_color_brewer(palette = "Accent", labels = c("Fair",
"Typical", "Excellent", "Good", "Poor"))+ scale_alpha_identity(0.3) p

hqc \<- guide_legend(title = "Heating Quality and Condition", nrow = 5)
p \<- p + guides(color = hqc) + theme(legend.position = "right") p p \<-
p + facet_wrap('Heating') p
